document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c8b4f0">saddest </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#1c48ff">noise, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#502c44">sweetest </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#1c48ff">noise, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c8b4f0">maddest </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#1c48ff">noise </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">that </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#88b0e0">grows, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d0e05c">birds, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">they </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#1c48ff">make </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">it </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">in </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c8b4f0">spring, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">At </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#18ff86">night's </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b454ff">delicious </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d0e05c">close, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Between </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d0e05c">March </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">and </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d0e05c">April </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d0e05c">line </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">That </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#1c48ff">magical </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c8b4f0">frontier </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Beyond </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">which </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c8b4f0">summer </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c8b4f0">hesitates, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Almost </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">too </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#1c48ff">heavenly </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">near. </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">It </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffec8c">makes </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">us </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">think </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">all </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c8b4f0">dead </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">That </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#94b8f8">sauntered </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">with </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">us </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">here, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">By </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#1c48ff">separation's </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c8b4f0">sorcery </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c8b4f0">Made </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d0e05c">cruelly </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">more </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d0e05c">dear. </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">It </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffec8c">makes </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">us </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">think </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">what </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">we </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">had, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">And </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">what </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">we </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">now </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#1c48ff">deplore. </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">We </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">almost </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">wish </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">those </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#18ff86">siren </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#1c48ff">throats </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Would </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">go </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">and </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#1c48ff">sing </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">no </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">more. </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">An </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#1c48ff">ear </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">can </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#1c48ff">break </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#1c48ff">human </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#1c48ff">heart </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">As </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#1c48ff">quickly </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">as </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d0e05c">spear. </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">We </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">wish </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#1c48ff">ear </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">had </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">not </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#1c48ff">heart </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">So </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c8b4f0">dangerously </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">near. </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: The saddest noise, the sweetest noise
